languages.text: "Она с самого начала была не в себе. Судить умалишенных — дело неблагодарное. Другой вопрос, что изрядная часть вины лежит на культе, что вбил в ее голову идею избранности — секта тоже должна ответить за произошедшее".

"She was never sane to begin with. Judging lunatics is a thankless duty. The more important thing to address is that her cult is guilty of having drilled the notion of chosenness into her head — the whole sect must answer for this incident."
languages.original_text: "Она с самого начала была не в себе. Судить умалишенных — дело неблагодарное. Другой вопрос, что изрядная часть вины лежит на культе, что вбил в ее голову идею избранности — секта тоже должна ответить за произошедшее".

traits.locale_text: "She was never sane to begin with. Judging the feeble-minded is a thankless duty. The more important thing to address is that her cult is guilty of having drilled the notion of chosenness into her head — the whole sect must answer for this incident."

"She was never sane to begin with. Judging the feeble-minded is a thankless duty. The more important thing to address is that her cult is guilty of having drilled the notion of chosenness into her head — the whole sect must answer for this incident."

"She was never sane to begin with. Judging lunatics is a thankless duty. The more important thing to address is that her cult is guilty of having drilled the notion of chosenness into her head — the whole sect must answer for this incident."

languages.text: “她从一开始就不正常，审判这群疯子是件吃力不讨好的事情。更重要的是，她所在的教派犯下了罪行。是那些人把这样的观念灌输到她的头脑中的，整个教派都要为这件事情负责。”
languages.original_text: "She was never sane to begin with. Judging lunatics is a thankless duty. The more important thing to address is that her cult is guilty of having drilled the notion of chosenness into her head — the whole sect must answer for this incident."

traits.locale_text: “她从一开始就不正常，审判这群疯子是件吃力不讨好的事情。更重要的是，她所在的教派犯下了罪行。是那些人把这样的观念灌输到她的头脑中的，整个教派都要为这件事情负责。”
“她从一开始就是个疯子，审判这些心智孱弱的人是件吃力不讨好的事情。更重要的是，她所在的教派犯下了罪行。是那些人把这样的观念灌输到她的头脑中的，整个教派都要为这件事情负责。”

languages.text: «Nunca ha estado cuerda. Juzgar a los lunáticos es una labor ingrata. Lo más importante es que su culto ha inculcado la noción de ser una elegida en su cabeza; toda la secta debe responder por este incidente».
languages.original_text: "She was never sane to begin with. Judging lunatics is a thankless duty. The more important thing to address is that her cult is guilty of having drilled the notion of chosenness into her head — the whole sect must answer for this incident."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca ha estado cuerda. Juzgar a los lunáticos es una labor ingrata. Lo más importante es que su culto ha inculcado la noción de ser una elegida en su cabeza; toda la secta debe responder por este incidente».

languages.text: « Elle n'a jamais été saine d'esprit. Le jugement des déments est une tâche ingrate. Nous devrions nous concentrer sur le fait que sa secte est coupable de l'avoir convaincue qu'elle avait été choisie. Tout le groupe de fanatiques devra répondre de cet incident. »
languages.original_text: "She was never sane to begin with. Judging lunatics is a thankless duty. The more important thing to address is that her cult is guilty of having drilled the notion of chosenness into her head — the whole sect must answer for this incident."

traits.locale_text: « Elle n'a jamais été saine d'esprit. Le jugement des déments est une tâche ingrate. Nous devrions nous concentrer sur le fait que sa secte est coupable de l'avoir convaincue qu'elle avait été choisie. Tout le groupe de fanatiques devra répondre de cet incident. »

languages.text: 「彼女は最初から正気ではありませんでした。狂人を裁くのは義務とはいえ報われません。ですがより重大なのは、彼女に『選ばれし者』という妄念を刷り込んだそのカルトの責任の方です。この事件については、教団全体が責任を問われなければなりません」
languages.original_text: "She was never sane to begin with. Judging lunatics is a thankless duty. The more important thing to address is that her cult is guilty of having drilled the notion of chosenness into her head — the whole sect must answer for this incident."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は最初から正気ではありませんでした。狂人を裁くのは義務とはいえ報われません。ですがより重大なのは、彼女に『選ばれし者』という妄念を刷り込んだそのカルトの責任の方です。この事件については、教団全体が責任を問われなければなりません」

languages.text: "Başından beri hiç aklı başında değildi. Delileri yargılamak nankör bir görevdir. Asıl önemli olan, tarikatının ona 'seçilmişlik' fikrini aşılamış olmasıdır. Tüm tarikat bu olaydan sorumlu tutulmalıdır."
languages.original_text: "She was never sane to begin with. Judging lunatics is a thankless duty. The more important thing to address is that her cult is guilty of having drilled the notion of chosenness into her head — the whole sect must answer for this incident."

traits.locale_text: "Başından beri hiç aklı başında değildi. Delileri yargılamak nankör bir görevdir. Asıl önemli olan, tarikatının ona 'seçilmişlik' fikrini aşılamış olmasıdır. Tüm tarikat bu olaydan sorumlu tutulmalıdır."

languages.text: "Sie war von Anfang an niemals bei klarem Verstand. Die Beurteilung von Wahnsinnigen ist eine undankbare Pflicht. Wichtiger dabei ist, dass ihr Kult die Schuld daran trägt, ihr die Idee des Auserwähltseins in den Kopf gesetzt zu haben – die gesamte Sekte muss sich für diesen Vorfall verantworten.
languages.original_text: "She was never sane to begin with. Judging lunatics is a thankless duty. The more important thing to address is that her cult is guilty of having drilled the notion of chosenness into her head — the whole sect must answer for this incident."

traits.locale_text: "Sie war von Anfang an niemals bei klarem Verstand. Die Beurteilung von Wahnsinnigen ist eine undankbare Pflicht. Wichtiger dabei ist, dass ihr Kult die Schuld daran trägt, ihr die Idee des Auserwähltseins in den Kopf gesetzt zu haben – die gesamte Sekte muss sich für diesen Vorfall verantworten.
